channel.title: TKMC [Dedicated][Modded][Private][Whitelisted][1.6.2] - Looking For Beta Testers
channel.description:
Greetings everyone!
I've currently in the testing and design stage of a custom modded server featuring several famous mods. We are looking for 5-10 [b]friendly, respectful, and intelligent[/b] players to help out with testing our server.
Keep in mind that the server could be up and down for the first few days as we get settled in. We're currently insuring that the mods are balanced, and that there are no internal mod conflicts. The best way to test this is to play. From experience I have learned that if you invite the public, generally things break and people find glitches.
If you're interested, want more information or would like to see our community, please head on over to http://mc.grwh.net/forums
You will need to join the forums to apply to the server and will want to make it clear that you have come from Mopar.
Enjoy your day and please feel free to post your questions here! :P
PS: My Name in this community and most other communities is [b]Kizz[/b]
[b]Current Mod Compile List:[/b]

item.dc:creator: @cdoggy cdoggy
item.description:
@cdoggy wrote:

Greetings everyone!

I’ve currently in the testing and design stage of a custom modded server featuring several famous mods. We are looking for 5-10 friendly, respectful, and intelligent players to help out with testing our server.

Keep in mind that the server could be up and down for the first few days as we get settled in. We’re currently insuring that the mods are balanced, and that there are no internal mod conflicts. The best way to test this is to play. From experience I have learned that if you invite the public, generally things break and people find glitches.

If you’re interested, want more information or would like to see our community, please head on over to http://mc.grwh.net/forums

You will need to join the forums to apply to the server and will want to make it clear that you have come from Mopar.

Enjoy your day and please feel free to post your questions here!

PS: My Name in this community and most other communities is Kizz
